statements: SELECT tour_id, destination, date FROM wine_tasting_tours;
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_tours WHERE tour_id = 5;
SELECT destination, participant_name FROM wine_tasting_tours WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM wine_tasting_tours WHERE destination = 'Napa Valley';
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_tours ORDER BY date DESC, destination ASC;
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_tours WHERE destination = 'Napa Valley' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT tour_id, destination, date FROM wine_tasting_tours WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe' AND participant_email = 'john@example.com';
SELECT DISTINCT destination FROM wine_tasting_tours WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_tours WHERE itinerary LIKE '%winery%' ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM wine_tasting_tours WHERE destination = 'Sonoma' AND date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, destination_id FROM destinations WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name FROM destinations WHERE destination_id > 3 ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM wine_tours WHERE participant_count < 10;
SELECT tour_id, destination_id, tour_date FROM wine_tours WHERE tour_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE destination_name LIKE '%Italy%' ORDER BY destination_id DESC;
SELECT destination_name, COUNT(tour_id) AS total_tours FROM destinations JOIN wine_tours ON destinations.destination_id = wine_tours.destination_id GROUP BY destination_name HAVING total_tours > 3;
SELECT destination_name, tour_date FROM destinations LEFT JOIN wine_tours ON destinations.destination_id = wine_tours.destination_id WHERE tour_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT destination_name, AVG(participant_count) AS avg_participants FROM destinations JOIN wine_tours ON destinations.destination_id = wine_tours.destination_id GROUP BY destination_name ORDER BY avg_participants DESC;

SELECT destination_name, tour_guide_name, participant_count FROM destinations JOIN wine_tours ON destinations.destination_id = wine_tours.destination_id WHERE participant_count BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY destination_name ASC, participant_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Destinations;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM Destinations WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM Destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Itineraries WHERE tour_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30';
SELECT participant_name, email FROM Participants WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Destinations WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM Destinations WHERE location = 'Europe';
SELECT destination_id, destination_name FROM Destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT Itineraries.itinerary_id, Destinations.destination_name, Itineraries.tour_date FROM Itineraries INNER JOIN Destinations ON Itineraries.destination_id = Destinations.destination_id;

SELECT Participants.participant_name, Participants.email, Destinations.destination_name FROM Participants LEFT JOIN Itineraries ON Participants.participant_id = Itineraries.itinerary_id LEFT JOIN Destinations ON Itineraries.destination_id = Destinations.destination_id;
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, destination_address FROM destinations ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE tour_date='2023-05-15';
SELECT id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE participant_email='test@example.com';
SELECT itinerary_id, participant_id, tour_date FROM tour_schedule WHERE participant_id=100 ORDER BY tour_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, destination_address FROM destinations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM itineraries ORDER BY tour_date DESC;

SELECT participants.participant_name, destinations.destination_name FROM participants JOIN tour_schedule ON participants.id = tour_schedule.participant_id JOIN itineraries ON tour_schedule.itinerary_id = itineraries.id JOIN destinations ON itineraries.destination_id = destinations.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS number_of_participants FROM participants;
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, city, country FROM destinations;
SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE tour_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT tour_id, rating FROM ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, city, country FROM destinations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT destination_name, address, city FROM destinations WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY destination_name;
SELECT destination_name, city, tour_date, start_time, end_time FROM destinations JOIN itineraries ON destinations.destination_id = itineraries.destination_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM participants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
